00051 #ifndef REGS_H
00052 #define REGS_H
00053 
00054 #include "host.h"
00055 #include "misc.h"
00056 #include "machine.h"
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * This module implements the SimpleScalar architected register state, which
00060  * includes integer and floating point registers and miscellaneous registers.
00061  * The architected register state is as follows:
00062  *
00063  * Integer Register File:                  Miscellaneous Registers:
00064  * (aka general-purpose registers, GPR's)
00065  *
00066  *   +------------------+                  +------------------+
00067  *   | $r0 (src/sink 0) |                  | PC               | Program Counter
00068  *   +------------------+                  +------------------+
00069  *   | $r1              |                  | HI               | Mult/Div HI val
00070  *   +------------------+                  +------------------+
00071  *   |  .               |                  | LO               | Mult/Div LO val
00072  *   |  .               |                  +------------------+
00073  *   |  .               |
00074  *   +------------------+
00075  *   | $r31             |
00076  *   +------------------+
00077  *
00078  * Floating point Register File:
00079  *    single-precision:  double-precision:
00080  *   +------------------+------------------+  +------------------+
00081  *   | $f0              | $f1 (for double) |  | FCC              | FP codes
00082  *   +------------------+------------------+  +------------------+
00083  *   | $f1              |
00084  *   +------------------+
00085  *   |  .               |
00086  *   |  .               |
00087  *   |  .               |
00088  *   +------------------+------------------+
00089  *   | $f30             | $f31 (for double)|
00090  *   +------------------+------------------+
00091  *   | $f31             |
00092  *   +------------------+
00093  *
00094  * The floating point register file can be viewed as either 32 single-precision
00095  * (32-bit IEEE format) floating point values $f0 to $f31, or as 16
00096  * double-precision (64-bit IEEE format) floating point values $f0 to $f30.
00097  */
00098 
00099 struct regs_t {
00100   md_gpr_t regs_R;              /* (signed) integer register file */
00101   md_fpr_t regs_F;              /* floating point register file */
00102   md_ctrl_t regs_C;             /* control register file */
00103   md_addr_t regs_PC;            /* program counter */
00104   md_addr_t regs_NPC;           /* next-cycle program counter */
00105   md_seg_t regs_S;              /* segment register file */ // UCSD
00106 };
00107 
00108 /* create a register file */
00109 struct regs_t *regs_create(void);
00110 
00111 /* initialize architected register state */
00112 void
00113 regs_init(struct regs_t *regs);         /* register file to initialize */
00114 
00115 #endif /* REGS_H */
